dataset_id: ATLAS/ICESat-2 L3A Ocean Surface Height V003
title: ATLAS/ICESat-2 L3A Ocean Surface Height V003
summary: This data set (ATL12) contains along-track sea surface heights at variable length scales over cloud-free regions. Estimates of height distributions, surface roughness, surface slope, and apparent reflectance are also provided. The data were acquired by the Advanced Topographic Laser Altimeter System (ATLAS) instrument on board the Ice, Cloud and land Elevation Satellite-2 (ICESat-2) observatory.
